headline: LG teases a triple-screen smartphone for September reveal
subtitle: The device is due to be announced on September 6th

previous_knowledgebase.manual_analysis:
This detachable accessory — which was never
                          released in the US — didn’t have the additional screen
                          on its exterior, which appears to be new for this version.
**we don’t know too much more about what LG is preparing to announce at the show.**

We’re also curious about whether there’s a
                          possibility that this could simply be a new accessory
                          for LG’s existing V50 ThinQ.
